text: The 2015 Copa América was a football sporting event that was organized by Confederación Sudamericana de Fútbol. It was held in Chile in 2015. 12 teams took part from many countries. Chile won their first title after beating Argentina in the final on a penalty shootout after a goalless draw. == Participants == (invited) (host nation) (invited) ==Venues== The tournament was in 9 stadiums in 8 cities.
